'''Deepwood Dweller's Delicacies''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Interacting with Deepwood Dweller's Delicacies opens the [[Cooking]] menu.

The blueprint for Deepwood Dweller's Delicacies is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Iron Chunk = 12
|sort = Iron Chunk
}}
